columns.Statement_ID: The unique identifier for each statement.
columns.Statement_Details: The detailed description of the statement.

Statements.table_description: The table stores statements with their unique identifiers and details.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.Budget_Type_Code: The code indicating the budget type associated with the document.
columns.Document_Details: The description providing details about the document.

Documents_with_Expenses.table_description: The table links documents to their associated budget types and details.

columns.Account_ID: The unique identifier for each account.
columns.Statement_ID: The identifier linking to the associated statement.
columns.Account_Details: The details providing information about the account.

Accounts.table_description: The table links accounts to statements and provides account details.

columns.Document_Type_Code: The unique identifier for each document type.
columns.Document_Type_Name: The name of the document type.
columns.Document_Type_Description: The description providing details about the document type.

Ref_Document_Types.table_description: The table stores different types of documents with identifiers, names, and descriptions.

columns.Budget_Type_Code: The unique identifier for each budget type.
columns.Budget_Type_Description: The description providing information about the budget type.

Ref_Budget_Codes.table_description: The table stores budget codes with identifiers and their corresponding descriptions.

columns.Project_ID: The unique identifier for each project.
columns.Project_Details: The description providing details about the project.

Projects.table_description: The table stores project information with unique identifiers and details.

columns.Document_ID: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.Document_Type_Code: The code indicating the type of document.
columns.Project_ID: The unique identifier for the associated project.
columns.Document_Date: The date and time when the document was created.
columns.Document_Name: The title or name of the document.
columns.Document_Description: The description providing additional information about the document.
columns.Other_Details: The supplementary information related to the document.

Documents.table_description: The table stores documents with their identifiers, types, projects, and details.
